application.doc: Retrieving throughput records for a specific Reverse Proxy instance

param.name: instance
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy instance to retrieve records for.

param.name: date
param.doc: The starting time, represented as a UNIX time stamp.

param.name: duration
param.doc: The duration of records from the starting time to retrieve, in seconds. (For example, 86400 for one day)

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieving throughput records for a specific Reverse Proxy instance
method.doc: To retrieve throughput records for a specific Reverse Proxy instance using the web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: FlowdataDetailed
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: h
param.doc: The total number of recorded hits during this interval.

param.name: t
param.doc: The starting time of this interval.
